website_summaries.verdict: A favorite brand among consumers who need excellent noise protection.
pros: Ideal for cancelling noise when sleeping, traveling and shooting
Extra-soft foam expands comfortably in ear canal
cons: May not work for users with small or narrow ear canals

customer_reviews.title: Seriously?  These must be dupes
customer_reviews.text: These must be faux Hearos. Mine arrived and the box looked normal (I have ordered these before). But...the color was way off. More pink than flesh/tan. Took them out and they had pieces of foam dangling from them. I have been buying the Hearos for years in the flesh color. NEVER have I seen anything like this. There is NO WAY I would put these in my ears. I don't know what's going on here, but it's not good. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: They couldn't leave well enough alone...
customer_reviews.text: A couple of years ago they changed the formula and it was no good. Then they went back to the Original Formula for a while (left one on picture) and it was great... now they went into this other formula (right) that is not as soft and darker..... Why change something that was great?
customer_reviews.author: MrBCID

customer_reviews.title: Hearos ear plugs feel most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs are the best and greatly needed as I continue to study. I prefer the Hearos brand. They retain their shape and block out the noise very effectively. They feel soft and don't irritate my ear canal. In fact, these are the only brand of ear plugs which feel as if I have nothing in my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Roman

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard and hardly cancel any noise
customer_reviews.text: I've bought the blue version (33db NRR) of these earplugs for many years and they have been excellent. I decided to get these tan versions so they would be less obvious if I were to bring some for public use. This things are actually terrible. They feel like a cheap dollarstore version of earplugs and I would definitely not want to wear these in any environment that could potentially damage your hearing. Save your money and either buy the blue version or a different brand because these are a complete waste of money which is sad because I know own 100pairs of completely useless earplugs
customer_reviews.author: jim armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Good for muffling sounds of a loud roommate
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for the last two years. They work well at drowning out a lot of my roommates loud bangs at night. You can still hear through these, but they definitely muffle the sound. I can hear my alarm in the morning too, which is nice so I don't sleep through it. My only complaint is that they are somewhat large for my ears and I tend to get some irritation to my ear in the one that has a tragus piercing. Otherwise I'm very satisified and will continue to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: MsBunny

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: These are the only ear plugs I use now. I've bought quite a few kinds. There are some other, cheaper kinds out there, but these go into the ear easily, they stay in (without getting loose or wiggling out), and give exactly the sort of hearing I need. I use these super often on my motorcycle and I can say that these are amazing. It dampens wind noise, engine noise, but I can still hear everything I need to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Gahl

customer_reviews.title: Find a better brand
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent product. I bought the smaller pack of the exact same "ultimate softness series" and they are nothing alike. Major step down in quality and softness.
customer_reviews.author: jack d

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable, functional
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly narrow ear canals and other brands hurt my ears after a few hours. These do not. They function very well. I use them literally every night. If this company ever goes out of business, I don't know what I will do!
customer_reviews.author: Deardon

customer_reviews.title: Really bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I have the blue ones NRR 33 and since I cannot find 100 pairs from the same I bought two boxes to my bad they are really bad quality they don't have the same body as the blue ones and they don't open fully and I hear a lot while using them really really bad I tested them after a month I bouaght or I still can get my money bad? thanks
customer_reviews.author: karlos

customer_reviews.title: My Invisible Tool
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive hearing because of a light brain injury. These are the the best ones I've tried. I can where them when I go out and they remove all the excess noises. I can hear conversations I'm having without background noise. I cut off 1/3 of the tip so they're invisible too! I don't have to look weird in public. I wear them at night to prevent waking up throughout the night.
customer_reviews.author: The Organic Millennial

customer_reviews.title: They do not crackle all night
customer_reviews.text: I am a light sleeper and Hearos are the only brand I have found that I like. They do not crackle all night and they block sound. My only gripe is that I get quite a few “duds” that do not fit right-probably 1 out of every 5. Despite that, I recommend these if you are a light sleeper and need to block noise.
customer_reviews.author: Genice J.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product, and I use it almost everyday to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, and I use it almost everyday to block out the noise from loud neighbors upstairs, and their loud ac/heater unit right outside of my bedroom window, which is located next to my bed. I highly recommend this product if you have smaller ear canals, and want a good night’s sleep. Sometimes, I sleep so well that I don’t even hear my alarm! I can still hear some sounds, but they are greatly muffled.
customer_reviews.author: RagingAtsuma

customer_reviews.title: Now outsourced, and uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Used to be made in America and the product was perfect! Once again we've lost a great product to greed! 🙁 Hearos used to be the best, read the other reviews, new manufacturer in Mexico, the box doesn't say made in America any more. New bad product, not as comfortable, not as well produced. Back to Mack's. Womp womp.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... sleep with for years and have found them most comfortable. IF they are worn correctly they block most ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these earplugs to sleep with for years and have found them most comfortable. IF they are worn correctly they block most noises and vastly reduce the rest. I have small ear canals and found these have the best fit for me. I am a very light sleeper and these do the job. They also work great for me on long plane flights and when I play drums in my band. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Wingman58

customer_reviews.title: A Life Saver for Your Hearing
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive hearing and I wear these to help prevent the trigger of migraines. I especially love how soft they are because I wear them for extended periods of time (even for sleeping). I won't be without them!
customer_reviews.author: julesvern81

customer_reviews.title: They’ve gone way downhill
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using hearos earplugs every night for several years, but this most recent pack really sucks. The density is super inconsistent to the point that some of them just fall right out of my ear at night because they are so flimsy. Others are fine. It’s so weird. I’ve noticed hearos has been having stock issues over the past year and I feel like these might be rejects. Looking for another brand sadly. No longer loyal to my tried and true hearos after this..

customer_reviews.title: NEW HEAROS FORMULA SUCKS - TOO STIFF
customer_reviews.text: UGH - these are a new material, much less squishy foam that is larger and gives me a headache. Too bad hearos had to make an inferior product like a Walgreens store brand earplug, what to save A QUARTER???????? I won't ever buy again and I'm sorry I didn't heed the other reviews that stated these are different earplugs than normal hearos.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Still the best earplugs around
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing earplugs to sleep for 10 years and have tried countless brands and models. These are the ones I always come back to. They are the absolute best combination of comfort and noise isolation.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Super Earplugs
customer_reviews.text: These are the only ones we buy as they work perfect and don't hurt our ears. We use them for off roading, snowmobiling, target practicing, wood chopping etc etc. Good quality and price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and quiet
customer_reviews.text: My wife snores, so these make sleeping, for me, a lot quieter. Soft sponge material so easy on my ears.
customer_reviews.author: ARN

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT hearos earplugs we used to buy, whatever they did these are now unusable. Dark uncomfortable foam, stringy mess, weird white residue all over. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Glebonator

customer_reviews.title: My husband won't use anything else!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these, and since he works 2nd shift and sleeps in the mornings, they work perfectly to block the outside noise like lawn care or garbage removal. He refuses to use any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: dKayM

customer_reviews.title: The best earplugs out there
customer_reviews.text: I got into the habit of sleeping with earplugs when my college roommate turned out to be a snorer and I’ve never gone back. Twenty years later and after much experimenting with different brands, I can say that these stand alone in terms of softness and blocking noise. Awesome to be able to get them in bulk on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Sean C.

customer_reviews.title: ... the years but these are by far the most comfortable ones I've found
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many earplugs over the years but these are by far the most comfortable ones I've found. Other earplugs have me waking up during the night with my ears hot and uncomfortable, these are the first ones where I can sleep through without noticing them. The thin form and soft foam makes them very easy to put in too.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Noise Blockers
customer_reviews.text: Great ear protection when mowing the lawn, working a chainsaw, using a vacuum cleaner or 'listening' to a nagging wife. My ears can't handle those sounds and now they can.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Botts

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The blue Hearos are good, but these don't expand enough and are much softer.
customer_reviews.author: Ilikenature

customer_reviews.title: Great Neutral Color Doesn't Stand Out
customer_reviews.text: Glad they're flesh colored; my husband won't wear bright colors because they stand out too much.
customer_reviews.author: grace stramiello

customer_reviews.title: Best ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: These ear plugs are the best ear plugs I could find for substructure purposes. Comfortable to wear daily. Great noise reduction.
customer_reviews.author: Julia S.

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to double check.
customer_reviews.text: They work but are a little too uncomfortable to wear while sleeping. Going to try the pink ones next. I thought I was buying the purple ones but got the orange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for noise reduction and COMFORT!
customer_reviews.text: My FAVORITE ear plugs. I have really good hearing almost too good so I need ear plugs to sleep. These are soft and reduce noise really well. I've recommended to many many friends and family over the years!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Silvestri

customer_reviews.title: Fakes?
customer_reviews.text: Same as Clay - these look very low quality compared to the ones I had before. Also the color appears in a completely different way when I looked at them under UV light. I think the ones I got are fakes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seriously soft for my ears, I wear them almost every night.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Best earplugs EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best earplugs EVER! I use these every night to block out my snoring husband and they work like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Best earplugs I have found.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and able to leave in for an entire nights sleep. Very effective at reducing noise.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Diefenderfer

customer_reviews.title: Always very comfortable and easy for me to sleep with them in
customer_reviews.text: Always very comfortable and easy for me to sleep with them in. I have bought many of these exact ones.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL P

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit or Significantly Dropped Quality
customer_reviews.text: Seem counterfeit. Either that or the quality has dropped significantly. Returning these.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Best Ear Plugs Ever
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and great for sleeping. Nothing negative to say.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Earplugs
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and a low price option for cancelling noise! I use these when I have a migraine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no good
customer_reviews.text: These are not good. They are hard and hurt my ears. Can not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: I also like the color which makes them less visible
customer_reviews.text: These ear plugs really do provide more noise reduction than other ear plugs I have used. I also like the color which makes them less visible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great for small ear canals
customer_reviews.text: These work really well to decrease peripheral noises, but still allow me to participate in the conversation at the table. These are great for small ear canals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for sleeping.
customer_reviews.text: These are ear plugs don’t reduce noise as much as some others. But they are super soft and much more comfortable than other kinds.
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe Douglas

customer_reviews.title: I looked high and low for some better ear plugs then the ones I had been buying ...
customer_reviews.text: Beyond disappointing... I have to sleep with ear plugs every single night. If I hear even the slightest noise I wide awake again. I looked high and low for some better ear plugs then the ones I had been buying at Walmart. I read lots of reviews saying these are the best and Boy... was I misslead. I can still hear EVERYTHING. So, now I have 100 ear plugs I’ll never again use
customer_reviews.author: Haley B.

customer_reviews.title: Block out majority of noise
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and good product. I am a light sleeper with a snoring husband. These help me get though the night by blocking out noise and muffling snoring.
customer_reviews.author: pattil

customer_reviews.title: Says neutral in description but got tan
customer_reviews.text: Got tan color instead of neutral. Tan is Not as close to skin color as neutral to me
customer_reviews.author: william christenbury

customer_reviews.title: Sleep well despite a snoring partner
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cure for a good relationship with a snoring husband. I trim them slightly at the end to enable them to fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Murtagh

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these several times and will order again. Love these things.
customer_reviews.author: Steve1776

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These things helped save my marriage. I use them every night.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Richards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is Hearos best product, and simply the most comfortable ear plugs you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use these every night and their comfortable and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Great earplugs for sleep
customer_reviews.text: Great for sleeping. They retain their "memory" for longer than other types I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my husband and he loves them. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: If you have a noise tolerance disorder then you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely different from a box bought 6 months ago... fakes?
customer_reviews.text: These straight up don't work, and are completely different from the last package of HEAROS Ultimate Softness earplugs I got. The foam is poor quality, and the bottoms are cut off. The last pair from the previous box work better than the brand new ones in this box- I readjuated the new ones several times but it continued to sound like I wasn't even wearing earplugs. I am not sure if HEAROS quality has slipped, or if this product is a fake, either way avoid them. Pictured: old, used plug on the right, new, useless plug on the left.
customer_reviews.author: VEH

customer_reviews.title: These new earplugs are a lot squishier than the ones ...
customer_reviews.text: These new earplugs are a lot squishier than the ones I have been using for years. The older version was denser. The new ones caused irritation sores in my ears after the second night using them, so I have had to go several night without earplugs and little sleep to let them heal. I think the softer squishier ones might be causing irritation by expanding and contracting and rubbing against the skin when it moves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sanitary
customer_reviews.text: Earplugs should be kept clean until they reach consumer. These are exposed to potential dirt and bugs by not having proper lining. I will not be placing these in my ear canal as it is impossible these were kept completely sanitary prior to shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and comfortable but not not best durability.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable earplugs that I have used, they are very soft and just the right size for me. They really block out noise when sleeping. Only drawback is that the lose their pliability faster than some other ear plugs. I get 4 nights sleep from one pair. The trade off is worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: art by emmo

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the blue ones in the past. These aren't quite as soft and comfortable. Quality is poor. Worse—they're smaller in diameter so they don't seal to block out the sound. Therefore, they simply don't work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Archer Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great for city living
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment building in New York City - sirens, drunken frat bros, outside my window. These are great for getting a good night's sleep - softer and more comfortable than other brands I have used. It's especially nice to no longer have to wake up to the sounds of my neighbors who share a wall at with me "going at it."
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Original Version
customer_reviews.text: These are the original Hearos. Read some less than favorable reviews about the new Hearos so I wanted to make sure I was getting the original product I knew worked well and these were it. Exactly the same shape and function as my old pairs, these are definitely the original style.
customer_reviews.author: SDO

customer_reviews.title: The best out there!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for bringing back the original!!!!! These earplugs are by far the best on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Amaris Rena

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because they are hugely inconsistent. Each box or package I get comes with different coating and firmness, but so far they do the job the best while leaving my ears extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: blackholesun

customer_reviews.title: Best in-ear protection I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these for shooting (indoor ranges I still double up with over-ears), chores, and even fishing trips with heavy snoring friends. Great all around!
customer_reviews.author: AvgReviewer

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: this did not work I tried one set I could hear everything, I just wasted my money. so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sg

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a light sleeper and have been using these for 13 years. They block out enough noise that I can sleep instead of waking up at every noise. I'm small with a small ear canal and these fit perfectly. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Lori F.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The original blue are still my favorites. These are ok but they don’t make me feel as comfortable as the blue. Truly ultra soft but not to my liking
customer_reviews.author: P. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Lowers Wind Noise
customer_reviews.text: I use these when I wear my full face motorcycle helmet. Its helps a lot. Lowers the wind noise and my ears dont hum anymore after long rides.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: Decently comfortable for the wife & I both. Cant hear the noisy neigbors when trying to sleep. THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Best earplugs ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using earplugs for years to sleep at night. These are very soft and Squishy yet offer maximum quietness. We've tried other brands and these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs are perfect for studying/sleeping in noisy environments or for inherently loud activities, such as shooting
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele Oliaro

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had better for concerts
customer_reviews.text: These do the job, they are reasonably priced. It is just my preference as far as sound properties that I took off a star. Will be fine if using at a worksite.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Reviewr

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. Effective and super comfortable. They're like stuffing little soundproof clouds into your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good and soft
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, very quiet. Still plugs in your ears so good luck sleeping on your side. Out of what I tried these are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable ear plugs I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable ear plugs I have ever tried. I love them and have been buying them for years.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Patel

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft these earplugs are and how they conform to my ear canals. They are comfortable to wear and seem to block noise and sound effectively. Glad I found them!
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: These work very well for me. I cut a ...
customer_reviews.text: These work very well for me. I cut a little bit off (the larger end) because they tend to fall out while I'm sleeping. Very soft, non irritating.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonRocks

customer_reviews.title: Good earplugs
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for my husband to wear while sleeping. Comfortable and block out a decent amount of noise.
customer_reviews.author: E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend wearing them when you have an important appointment in ...
customer_reviews.text: We live next to a train station. These ear plugs definitely blocks a lot of noises!!! I do not recommend wearing them when you have an important appointment in the morning, because it works so great that you may miss your alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J.

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable ear plugs I have ever used. Easy to put in your ear and then expand to really block sound.
customer_reviews.author: armadillo

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I am a light sleeper so ear ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I am a light sleeper so ear plugs are very helpful, but most hurt my ears so I can't even wear them. These changed how I view ear plugs and changed my life! If you are looking for ear plugs, I can't recommend these enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio de Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: No hear for your ear.
customer_reviews.text: I use these every night when I get in the jetted tub. They work very well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Smith

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Earplugs!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect earplug! They're so soft and comfortable and block out almost too much noise... make sure your alarm is set to vibrate.
customer_reviews.author: Scully

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: My favorite ear plugs ever. Comfy and dont hurt your ears
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well when trying to block out noise when sleeping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Won't ride my motorcycle without them (and my helmet, of course)
customer_reviews.author: O. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Fast shippment
customer_reviews.text: Plugs are a bit small for grownups so the seal is not complete
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy these earplugs they are AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Product was just as described. The package came sooner than expected! Would order again
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Walsh

customer_reviews.title: They’re foam ear plugs...
customer_reviews.text: They work as intended. Roll them up, stick them in your ear canals and you’re set.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Are These Kids Size ?
customer_reviews.text: I am a small person, 5’2,” average weight & these are TOO small for my ear canal so be aware....

product_meta.title: HEAROS Ultimate Softness Foam Earplugs, 32dB NRR Ear Plugs, 100 Pairs, Soft Ear Plugs Noise Reduction for Hearing Protection, Sleeping, Snoring, Working, Shooting,
product_meta.description: Did you know that the first foam ear plugs were “barrel and blunt” shaped and made of polyvinyl chloride. While these ear plugs achieved noise reduction ratings as high as 29 decibels, the dense foam could be challenging to roll for proper insertion as well as fit and the coarse surface of the ear plugs could feel rather abrasive against the thin inner lining of the ear canal. Foam ear plugs took a quantum leap forward with the advent of polyurethane ear plugs as this material offer a significantly enhanced user experience with low pressure foam that was easy to roll, tapered tip designs that more were more comfortable, provided high protection levels, silky smooth surfaces and certified noise reduction ratings as high as 33 decibels. With the HEAROS Ultimate Softness Series, you can experience the highest levels of protection, comfort, fit and ease of insertion of any foam ear plug available. Upon touching the extraordinary softness of these foam ear plugs you will immediately recognize the premium nature of the product. Thanks to HEAROS proprietary foam formulation these ear plugs roll down and “slowly recover” giving you plenty of time to properly position them in your ears. So whether you’re using the HEAROS for noise reduction or hearing protection, you now can have complete confidence that you’re using the best ear plugs for your ears. The ear plugs have been tested and certified to provide a Noise Reduction Rating (NRR) of 32 decibels. HEAROS foam ear plugs are to be used for all noise reduction and hearing protection purposes.
feature_bullets: SILKY SMOOTH hypoallergenic, super soft proprietary formulation of polyurethane foam for an ultra premium user experience. Popular tapered shape with flat back and beige color for inconspicuous wear.
ORIGINAL FORMULA - EASY TO INSERT and use. Comfortable roll down slow recovery foam gives user time to properly insert ear plugs and achieve the best, most comfortable fit every time

NOISE REDUCTION RATING (NRR) 32 Decibels . With NRR32 being the highest grade for foam earplugs, HEAROS Certified hearing protection offer provide an uncomprimized balance between performance and comfort. Slightly smaller size compared to HEAROS Xtreme Series, offers protection for those people with smaller ear canals.

PROTECT your hearing in loud environments at work and home. Block snoring noise so you fall asleep and stay asleep. Protect your hearing at concerts and jam sessions. Block annoying noises while traveling. Protect your hearing when shooting guns. Block noise so you can focus and study
USES - Ideal for all of your noise reduction needs such as sleeping, studying, travel, meditation, reading, concerts, loud events, shooting and many more
